author: Bernard Lions
title: Vidéo : le beau but de Mbappé au terme d'une séquence qui aurait pu coûter un penalty au Real
text:
Titularisé ce jeudi soir pour le 8e de finale de la Coupe du Roi devant le Celta Vigo, Kylian Mbappé a ouvert le score pour le Real Madrid à la 37e minute. Un but qui n'a pas fini de faire parler. D'une part, parce qu'au tout début de l'action, Jose Luis Munuera Montero, l'arbitre principal, conforté dans sa décision par le VAR, a décidé de ne pas sanctionner la faute du gardien ukrainien Andreï Lounine dans les pieds de Williot Swedberg, l'attaquant suédois du Celta Vigo. D'autre part, parce que Mbappé en a profité pour partir depuis sa moitié de terrain. Après avoir fixé Rodriguez, le Français de 26 ans a décoché une superbe frappe puissante du gauche en angle fermé.

author: Uniindia News Service
title: Qantas plane damaged in jet bridge collision at Brisbane airport in Australia
text: WorldPosted at: Jun 19 2025 8:30AM Qantas plane damaged in jet bridge collision at Brisbane airport in AustraliaSydney, June 19 (UNI) A plane of Australian airline Qantas has been damaged after colliding with a jet bridge at the Brisbane International Airport on Wednesday night. Flight QF186 struck a passenger jet bridge after landing in Brisbane from Queenstown in New Zealand shortly before 6:40 p.m. local time on Wednesday, local media Brisbane Times reported on Thursday morning. Images published by the newspaper on Thursday show that the windscreen of the Boeing 737-800 was shattered in the incident. No injuries were reported and passengers disembarked the plane via the stairs. A spokesperson for Qantas said that the airline was investigating how the bridge made contact with the front of the aircraft. "The aircraft will be inspected by engineers in Brisbane and repaired before returning to service," he said. It is the second jet bridge strike at the Brisbane airport in under a month after Air New Zealand Flight NZ146 made contact with a bridge as it was pushing back from a gate on May 22 and sustained a puncture in the fuselage, causing the scheduled flight to Auckland to be canceled. UNI XINHUA ARNTags: #Qantas plane damaged in jet bridge collision at Brisbane airport in Australia

author: CCX Media
title: Ground News - Salvation Army Sees Record Demand at Food Shelves
text: A familiar face to Minnesota hockey fans made his way to Maple Grove on Wednesday to help support a good cause. Minnesota Wild mascot Nordy was at the Maple Grove Cub to lend a hand with the Salvation Army’s month-long food drive. Nordy’s appearance is part of the Salvation Army’s ongoing quest to collect nonperishable food to restock the shelves of their nine metro-area food pantries. author: 小浪财讯
title: 创业板200ETF富国（159571）跌1.40%，半日成交额66.42万元|创业板_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，创业板200ETF富国（159571）跌1.40%，报1.201元，成交额66.42万元。创业板200ETF富国（159571）重仓股方面， 全志科技 截止午盘跌0.54%， 蓝色光标 跌1.56%， 长盈精密 跌1.90%， 惠城环保 跌1.53%， 罗博特科 跌1.42%， 协创数据 跌0.06%， 汉得信息 跌1.45%， 奥飞数据 跌0.63%， 汤姆猫 涨0.18%， 银之杰 跌2.09%。
创业板200ETF富国（159571）业绩比较基准为 创业板中盘200指数 收益率，管理人为富国基金管理有限公司，基金经理为金泽宇、葛俊阳，成立（2023-12-20）以来回报为21.96%，近一个月回报为4.93%。

author: Redacción Animal Político
title: Secuestran a trabajadores de limpia y del ayuntamiento de Taxco, Guerrero
text:
Un grupo de civiles armados secuestró a un grupo de personas dedicadas al trabajo de limpia y reciclaje de residuos , así como a empleados del Ayuntamiento de Taxco, Guerrero.
Un grupo de civiles armados se llevó por la fuerza a las víctimas y hasta el momento no se sabe nada de su paradero. De acuerdo con Amapola Periodismo , entre las personas privadas de su libertad se encuentra la directora del relleno sanitario de Taxco , Anabel Gutiérrez.
Hasta ahora la cifra de personas que fueron plagiadas no ha sido confirmada por las autoridades, aunque en su comunicado la Fiscalía habla de 12 personas.
Operativo de búsqueda en Taxco De acuerdo con la Fiscalía de Guerrero, se implementó desde el 27 de diciembre un operativo de búsqueda en el municipio de Taxco de Alarcón.
“La Fiscalía General del Estado informa que, en relación con la noticia criminal que circula en redes sociales, sobre la desaparición de 12 personas en el municipio de Taxco de Alarcón, en coordinación con el Ejército Mexicano y la Guardia Nacional, el día de ayer implementó un operativo de búsqueda en el municipio de Taxco de Alarcón”, indicó en un comunicado.
Comunicado de la Fiscalía de Guerrero. No hay denuncia por la desaparición de trabajadores Asimismo, detalló que hasta ahora no se cuenta con una denuncia formal por la desaparición de los empleados de Taxco, aunque se inició una carpeta de investigación por el delito de desaparición cometida por particulares.
“La Fiscalía continúa con las investigaciones de gabinete y campo, así como con los operativos de búsqueda para poder esclarecer el ilícito y lograr la pronta localización de las víctimas”, informó.
En el mismo comunicado, la dependencia indicó que durante la madrugada de hoy realizaron un operativo en el poblado de Huixtac donde denunciaron que había personas privadas de su libertad.
Al lugar llegaron elementos de la Fiscalía, Ejército y Guardia Nacional pero no hallaron a las personas, solo dos automóviles y una motocicleta con reporte de robo.
Desapariciones y violencia en Taxco En los últimos meses en Taxco ocurrieron varios hechos violentos. El 25 de diciembre localizaron los cadáveres de Lucero Torres Iturralde y Jorge Mejía Reyes, ambos profesores reportados como desaparecidos.
En noviembre, tres periodistas fueron privados de su libertad en el mismo municipio, quienes fueron liberados después de varios días.
Manifestación para exigir la presentación con vida de tres comunicadores del municipio de Taxco. Foto: Archivo Cuartoscuro. A ello se suma el cierre de negocios debido a los hechos de violencia y a las extorsiones de parte de grupos del crimen organizado. El grupo criminal de la Familia Michoacana es señalado de realizar las extorsiones a los comercios de Taxco.

author: @NicoDiFrancesco
title: Diretta live della guerra tra Israele e Hamas oggi, venerdì 23 agosto
text:
Home » Esteri Esteri Guerra Israele-Hamas, le ultime notizie | DIRETTA
di Niccolò Di Francesco 23 Ago. 2024 alle 07:00 118 Diretta live della guerra tra Israele e Hamas oggi, venerdì 23 agosto L’Egitto esprime scetticismo sul raggiungimento di un accordo per il cessate il fuoco a Gaza, alla vigilia della prevista ripresa dei negoziati al Cairo. Intanto, secondo quanto scrive il Washington Post il presidente Usa Joe Biden avrebbe fatto delle concessioni a Netanyahu, notizia però smentita proprio dal primo ministro israeliano. Nel frattempo, la portaerei americana Lincoln è arrivata in Medio Oriente. Di seguito le ultime notizie di oggi, venerdì 23 agosto 2024, sulla guerra tra Israele e Hamas a Gaza, con Hezbollah in Libano e la crisi in corso in Medio Oriente.
DIRETTA Notizia in aggiornamento
118 Niccolò Di Francesco Classe 1982, dall'età di 21 anni lavora nel mondo del giornalismo. Dal 2019 a TPI, è padre di Tommaso, il suo miglior "articolo". Ti potrebbe interessare Esteri / Precipita dal sesto piano di un hotel di Ibiza mentre è in vacanza: morta una 19enne Esteri / Obama e le "dimensioni" di Trump: il discorso dell'ex presidente Usa diventa virale Esteri / Washington Post: “Da Netanyahu concessioni a Biden”. Ma il premier israeliano smentisce: "Non è vero"

author: @FOX19
title: Report: Violent crime down at UC, but car thefts and assaults remain high
text: CINCINNATI (WXIX) - Police records from 2021 through July show violent crime has fallen in and around the University of Cincinnati campus this year. Crime remains an issue on campus. Cincinnati Police Chief Teresa Theetge said students should be vigilant when walking around campus. “If something doesn’t feel right in your gut, it’s probably not,” Theetge said. “So change the environment in which you’re in. Be with a friend, at least one or two friends while you’re walking.” FOX19 NOW looked at police records going back to 2021 and found motor vehicle thefts, menacing, felonious assault, burglary, rape and inducing panic are crimes that are regularly reported. Police reports in Clifton and on the UC campus reported the following as the top crimes in the area: - Ninety reported car thefts last year. Twenty-seven car thefts have been reported in Clifton this year while 24 thefts were reported on campus in the previous two years. - More than 50 assaults have been reported on the UC campus in the past two years. - Cincinnati’s CUF neighborhood reported 27 assaults in 2023, the same number reported in the neighborhood through July of this year. Theetge said the spike in Kia and Hyundai thefts has affected the numbers around UC. “Don’t leave your car running,” Theetge said. “Lock it up, take your keys with you. We have seen a spike over the last couple of years, most of them Kia and Hyundai thefts.” “Keeping all of our residents safe is our primary goal,” UC Chief of Police Eliot Isaac said. Students who spoke with FOX19 NOW said they felt safe on campus. They credited the visibility of campus police and security. “There is always police around and security,” student Luke Laufenberg said. “I feel safe when I’m out.” Jake Wisneski said students should know what areas to stay away from. “You have to know where and where not to go,” Wisneski said. “I would say after my first year I really do feel safe on campus.” Students are beginning to return to campus for the start of the 2024-2025 school year. The school year officially starts on Aug. 26. UC police said students and the public should be aware of more pedestrian traffic as students return. See a spelling or grammar error in our story? Please click here to report it . Do you have a photo or video of a breaking news story? Send it to us here with a brief description. Copyright 2024 WXIX. All rights reserved.

author: James Kaufman
title: This alternative to AirTags is cheap and just as good
text:
An alternative to AirTags that is almost identical, compatible with the iPhone's Search app and at a price that's hard to believe. This is the best alternative to AirTags and it is cheap
Join the conversation
Apple has revolutionized locator devices . On the one hand, it has launched the AirTag, a small infallible device that can be located when it is far away even if it does not have GPS or an internet connection. And on the other hand, creating the Search Network, a network to which AirTags connect and to which any manufacturer can access.
This means that anyone can make an equally good alternative to AirTags, since by using Apple's Search Network it can be located from the iPhone's Search app just like an AirTag. and one of the best alternatives It currently has very important discounts.
The ATUVOS Tag is on sale in different packs that are very worthwhile. On the one hand, we have a 20% discount with a coupon on the individual model which makes Its price drops to 17.59 euros on Amazon .
ATUVOS Bluetooth Object Locator
For just 17 euros you get the best alternative to AirTags
We also have on offer the package of two ATUVOS Tag with a 10 euro coupon which being remains in only 29.99 euros , each for less than 15 euros. And there is also the pack of 4 with a discount of another 10 euros that remains in 43.99 euros practically 11 euros for each device.
ATUVOS Bluetooth Object Locator (Pack of 2)
ATUVOS Bluetooth Object Locator (Pack of 4)
Like other Apple devices, ATUVOS Tag can also enter lost mode, this way you will be automatically notified when other devices or the Search Network detect it. You can also add your contact information so that when someone approaches your tag with an NFC-enabled smartphone, they can get your contact information to help you find the lost item.
The ATUVOS Tag works just like an AirTag and shares many of its functions. By just bringing it close to the iPhone you can add and configure it, from the Search app you can locate it on a map just like an AirTag, put it in lost mode or make it ring. In addition, being compatible with Red Search, Any iPhone, iPad or Mac on the planet will be able to locate the ATUVOS Tag making it more useful than other alternatives.
